Uses of Interface
com.composum.pages.commons.service.ResourceManager.Design

  • Packages that use ResourceManager.Design 
    Package Description
    com.composum.pages.commons.service

    • Uses of ResourceManager.Design in com.composum.pages.commons.service

      Classes in com.composum.pages.commons.service that implement ResourceManager.Design 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  PagesResourceManager.DesignImpl
      the reference to a design rule of a content element; this is referencing the child resource of the structure matching 'cpp:design' subnode of a template appropriate for a content element; such a design is used to get design properties of an element, especially the content structure pattern sets ('allowedContainers', 'allowedElements', ...)
      Fields in com.composum.pages.commons.service declared as ResourceManager.Design 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected ResourceManager.Design PagesResourceManager.NO_DESIGN  
      Fields in com.composum.pages.commons.service with type parameters of type ResourceManager.Design 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      protected Map<String,​ResourceManager.Design> PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl.designCache  
      Methods in com.composum.pages.commons.service that return ResourceManager.Design 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      protected ResourceManager.Design PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl.findDesign​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource templateNode, org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource contentNode, String relativePath, String elementType, int weight)
      The internal 'find' for a design is searching for the best matching 'cpp:design' content element of the template and then searching for the best matching element node of the selected 'cpp:design' resource.
      protected ResourceManager.Design PagesResourceManager.ReferenceImpl.getDesign()
      retrieves the design of this resource reference form the template of the containing or designated page
      ResourceManager.Design PagesResourceManager.TemplateImpl.getDesign​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource pageContent, String relativePath, String resourceType)
      Retrieves es the design rules for an element of a page; the design rules are configured as elements of a 'cpp:design' child node of the templates content resource.
      ResourceManager.Design ResourceManager.Template.getDesign​(org.apache.sling.api.resource.Resource pageContent, String relativePath, String resourceType)
      Retrieves es the design rules for an element of a page; the design rules are configured as elements of a 'cpp:design' child node of the templates content resource.
